mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TRAIN(T_ID, T_THEME, T_CONTENT, T_BEGINTIME, T_ENDTIME, T_ADDRESS, T_STATE) VALUES (T_TRAIN_SEQ.nextval,#{theme},#{content},#{begintime},#{endtime},#{address},#{state})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_TRAIN SET T_RELEASETIME=NULL,T_STATE=#{state} where T_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_TRAIN tr,T_EMPTOTR ett,T_EMPLOYEE emp,T_DEPARTMENT dep,T_POSITION pos WHERE tr.T_ID=ett.ETT_TID AND emp.EMP_ID=ett.ETT_EMPID AND emp.EMP_DEPID=dep.DEP_ID AND emp.EMP_POSID=pos.POS_ID
